topic.title: House Show
topic.shortdesc: This is my date idea for artistic couples or those who enjoy live music.

section.title: About
section.p: Not into sweaty frat houses but crave the high energy of parties? House shows are the way to go! From metal to indie rock to smooth jazz, it's no secret that Blacksburg has one of the best music scenes in the state – you just have to know where to look. Hosted multiple nights a week at various locations across town, house shows are one of the hottest activities for Blacksburg residents.

image.alt: Three guys jam out in a cluttered house.

section.title: Review
section.p: As an advertising student turned radio host, you could take a guess that I love the arts – especially music. Going to house shows is my favorite way to unwind after a long and stressful week.

section.title: Recommendation
section.p: Skip the expensive Uber ride and $15 cocktails when you check out a house show – parking is free and door cover is only a couple Washingtons. Going with the flow and letting loose is the goal here: bring a 6-pack, your date, and lots of energy, you're going to need it! I recommend going to a house show on a Friday or Saturday night, when the place is packed full of exciting characters and the band lineups are unbeatable.
